changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF COL_LENGTH('FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION','WORKFLOW_ID') IS NULL ALTER TABLE FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION ADD WORKFLOW_ID NVARCHAR(64); UPDATE FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION SET WORKFLOW_ID = RIGHT(DESCRIPTION, LEN(DESCRIPTION)-33) WHERE DESCRIPTION LIKE 'Missing PI Server input data for%'

rollback.sql: IF COL_LENGTH('FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION','WORKFLOW_ID') IS NOT NULL ALTER TABLE FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION DROP COLUMN WORKFLOW_ID
